text:
QUESTION 175) In agricultural regions, it is common to be the presence of silos for storage and drying of grain production, in the shape of a straight cylinder, superimposed by a cone, and dimensions indicated in the figure. The filled silo and grain transport is done on load trucks whose capacity is 20 mÂ³. A region has a full silo and only a truck to transport the grains to the benefit plant.
3 m 12 m 3 m Use 3 as approach to p. The minimum number of trips the truck will need to carry the entire volume of grains stored in the silo is
A) 6.
B) 16.
C) 17.
D) 18.
E) 21.
